verses.verse: And Ya`akov <WH3290> went <WH1980> <WH8804> on his way <WH1870>, and the angels <WH4397> of 'Elohim <WH430> met <WH6293> <WH8799> him.

And when Ya`akov <WH3290> saw them <WH7200> <WH8804>, he said <WH559> <WH8799>, This is 'Elohim's <WH430> host <WH4264>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Mahanaim <WH4266>.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> before him <WH6440> to Esav <WH6215> his brother <WH251> unto the land <WH776> of Seir <WH8165>, the country <WH7704> of Edom <WH123>.

And he commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus shall ye speak <WH559> <WH8799> unto my lord <WH113> Esav <WH6215>; Thy servant <WH5650> Ya`akov <WH3290> saith <WH559> <WH8804> thus, I have sojourned <WH1481> <WH8804> with Laban <WH3837>, and stayed there <WH309> <WH8799> until now:

And I have oxen <WH7794>, and asses <WH2543>, flocks <WH6629>, and menservants <WH5650>, and womenservants <WH8198>: and I have sent <WH7971> <WH8799> to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> my lord <WH113>, that I may find <WH4672> <WH8800> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>.

And the messengers <WH4397> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> to Ya`akov <WH3290>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, We came <WH935> <WH8804> to thy brother <WH251> Esav <WH6215>, and also he cometh <WH1980> <WH8802> to meet thee <WH7125> <WH8800>, and four hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> with him.

Then Ya`akov <WH3290> was greatly <WH3966> afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> and distressed <WH3334> <WH8799>: and he divided <WH2673> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> that was with him, and the flocks <WH6629>, and herds <WH1241>, and the camels <WH1581>, into two <WH8147> bands <WH4264>;

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, If Esav <WH6215> come <WH935> <WH8799> to the one <WH259> company <WH4264>, and smite it <WH5221> <WH8689>, then the other company <WH4264> which is left <WH7604> <WH8737> shall escape <WH6413>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799>, O 'Elohim <WH430> of my father <WH1> Avraham <WH85>, and 'Elohim <WH430> of my father <WH1> Yitz'chak <WH3327>, the YY <WH3068> which saidst <WH559> <WH8802> unto me, Return <WH7725> <WH8798> unto thy country <WH776>, and to thy kindred <WH4138>, and I will deal well <WH3190> <WH8686> with thee:

I am not worthy of the least <WH6994> <WH8804> of all the mercies <WH2617>, and of all the truth <WH571>, which thou hast shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> unto thy servant <WH5650>; for with my staff <WH4731> I passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> this Yarden <WH3383>; and now I am become two <WH8147> bands <WH4264>.

Deliver me <WH5337> <WH8685>, I pray thee, from the hand <WH3027> of my brother <WH251>, from the hand <WH3027> of Esav <WH6215>: for I fear <WH3373> him, lest he will come <WH935> <WH8799> and smite me <WH5221> <WH8689>, and the mother <WH517> with <WH5921> the children <WH1121>.

And thou saidst <WH559> <WH8804>, I will surely <WH3190> <WH8687> do thee good <WH3190> <WH8686>, and make <WH7760> <WH8804> thy seed <WH2233> as the sand <WH2344> of the sea <WH3220>, which cannot be numbered <WH5608> <WH8735> for multitude <WH7230>.

And he lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> there that same night <WH3915>; and took <WH3947> <WH8799> of that which came <WH935> <WH8802> to his hand <WH3027> a present <WH4503> for Esav <WH6215> his brother <WH251>;
Two hundred <WH3967> she goats <WH5795>, and twenty <WH6242> he goats <WH8495>, two hundred <WH3967> ewes <WH7353>, and twenty <WH6242> rams <WH352>,

Thirty <WH7970> milch <WH3243> <WH8688> camels <WH1581> with their colts <WH1121>, forty <WH705> kine <WH6510>, and ten <WH6235> bulls <WH6499>, twenty <WH6242> she asses <WH860>, and ten <WH6235> foals <WH5895>.

And he delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of his servants <WH5650>, every drove <WH5739> by themselves; and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his servants <WH5650>, Pass over <WH5674> <WH8798> before me <WH6440>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> a space <WH7305> betwixt <WH996> drove <WH5739> and <WH996> drove <WH5739>.

And he commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the foremost <WH7223>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, When Esav <WH6215> my brother <WH251> meeteth thee <WH6298> <WH8799>, and asketh thee <WH7592> <WH8804>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Whose art thou? and whither goest <WH3212> <WH8799> thou? and whose are these before <WH6440> thee?

Then thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804>, They be thy servant <WH5650> Ya`akov's <WH3290>; it is a present <WH4503> sent <WH7971> <WH8803> unto my lord <WH113> Esav <WH6215>: and, behold, also he is behind us <WH310>.

And so <WH1571> commanded he <WH6680> <WH8762> the second <WH8145>, and the third <WH7992>, and all that followed <WH1980> <WH8802> <WH310> the droves <WH5739>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, On this manner <WH1697> shall ye speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Esav <WH6215>, when ye find <WH4672> <WH8800> him.

And say ye <WH559> <WH8804> moreover <WH1571>, Behold, thy servant <WH5650> Ya`akov <WH3290> is behind us <WH310>. For he said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will appease <WH3722> <WH8762> him <WH6440> with the present <WH4503> that goeth <WH1980> <WH8802> before me <WH6440>, and afterward <WH310> I will see <WH7200> <WH8799> his face <WH6440>; peradventure he will accept <WH5375> <WH8799> of me <WH6440>.
So went <WH5674> the present <WH4503> over <WH5674> <WH8799> before him <WH6440>: and himself lodged <WH3885> <WH8804> that night <WH3915> in the company <WH4264>.

And he rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> that night <WH3915>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> his two <WH8147> wives <WH802>, and his two <WH8147> womenservants <WH8198>, and his eleven <WH6240> <WH259> sons <WH3206>, and passed over <WH5674> <WH8799> the ford <WH4569> Yabok <WH2999>.
And he took them <WH3947> <WH8799>, and sent them over <WH5674> <WH8686> the brook <WH5158>, and sent over <WH5674> <WH8686> that he had.
And Ya`akov <WH3290> was left <WH3498> <WH8735> alone; and there wrestled <WH79> <WH8735> a man <WH376> with him until the breaking <WH5927> <WH8800> of the day <WH7837>.

And when he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that he prevailed <WH3201> <WH8804> not against him, he touched <WH5060> <WH8799> the hollow of his thigh <WH3409>; and the hollow <WH3709> of Ya`akov's <WH3290> thigh <WH3409> was out of joint <WH3363> <WH8799>, as he wrestled <WH79> <WH8736> with him.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me go <WH7971> <WH8761>, for the day <WH7837> breaketh <WH5927> <WH8804>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will not let thee go <WH7971> <WH8762>, except <WH518> thou bless <WH1288> <WH8765> me.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What is thy name <WH8034>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ya`akov <WH3290>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thy name <WH8034> shall be called <WH559> <WH8735> no more Ya`akov <WH3290>, but Yisra'EL <WH3478>: for as a prince hast thou power <WH8280> <WH8804> with 'Elohim <WH430> and with men <WH582>, and hast prevailed <WH3201> <WH8799>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> asked <WH7592> <WH8799> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, thy name <WH8034>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Wherefore is it <WH2088> that thou dost ask <WH7592> <WH8799> after my name <WH8034>? And he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> him there.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> P'ni-EL <WH6439>: for I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH430> face <WH6440> to face <WH6440>, and my life <WH5315> is preserved <WH5337> <WH8735>.
And as he passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> Penuel <WH6439> the sun <WH8121> rose <WH2224> <WH8799> upon him, and he halted <WH6760> <WH8802> upon his thigh <WH3409>.

Therefore the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> eat <WH398> <WH8799> not of the sinew <WH1517> which shrank <WH5384>, which is upon the hollow <WH3709> of the thigh <WH3409>, unto this day <WH3117>: because he touched <WH5060> <WH8804> the hollow <WH3709> of Ya`akov's <WH3290> thigh <WH3409> in the sinew <WH1517> that shrank <WH5384>.
